name: geekly_media_shop
description: E-commerce responsive web application built with TypeScript, React, Express and SQLite

scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd client && npm run lint" "cd server && npm run lint"
scripts.build: npm install && npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client && npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix server
scripts.build-client: npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
scripts.build-server: npm install --prefix server && npm run build --prefix server

author: MrTrukiny
